text: Rizwan Ahmed (born 1 December 1982), also known as Riz MC, is an English actor, musician, and activist. He is known for his roles as Rick in Nightcrawler (2014), Carlton Drake in Venom (2018) and as Ruben Stone in Sound of Metal (2020). In 2017, he won an Emmy Award. For his role as Stone, Ahmed was nominated for a Golden Globe Award and Academy Award in 2021. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:English rappers Category:English activists Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Singers from London Category:Musicians from London Category:Actors from London
title: Riz Ahmed
